abstract: Regulators are investigating Bank of America and Merrill Lynch as both companies try to move past the problems of the financial crisis.
snippet: Regulators are investigating Bank of America and Merrill Lynch as both companies try to move past the problems of the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America disclosed on Thursday that the Justice Department was weighing whether to bring a civil complaint against it over claims that the bank had improperly handled securities backed by jumbo loans.

headline.main: U.S. May Move Against Bank Over Jumbo Loan Securities
headline.print_headline: U.S. May Move Against Bank Over Jumbo Loan Securities
